isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Service (1994) - INTRODUCTION - FUEL SYSTEM - INTERMEDIATE PRESSURE

svcproc.title: INTERMEDIATE PRESSURE
svcproc.para: The transfer pump produces an intermediate pressure on the fuel. Fuel now flows from the transfer pump to the inside port of the fuel filter header. Fuel then travels through an internal passage into the fuel filter. Fuel passes through the fuel filter and out the fuel filter header, through a fuel line to the fuel supply port of the fuel injection pump.
